column4: welcome, whaley. now, can you answer my questions about gentoo in pm?
I thought this was America  - Stan's Dad South Park, nomad111 .
just tell me how to set up grub
how would you like it set up?
i want to set windows to my default boot

ok, I think I can tell you how to do that. So you just want windows to boot by default instead of ubuntu? if so, please in a terminal type cat /boot/grub/menu.lst and paste the ouptut of that to pastebin.ubuntulinux.nl then I will tell you what next.
i posted
just a sec, I stopped my gdm for some reason a moment ago, let me get started up.
take ur time
OK, see the default 0 in the top of your /boot/grub/menu.list file?

just prepend your post to me with my nick, irssi has higlighting for that, and I use irssi. OK,  well, that means that the first boot entry in your menu.lst file is used to be the default. you need to set it to the number that the windows installation is. I think it is 6 so make default 6, then try rebooting, please.
k ill try it out
u r a legend
good luck. it should work, let me know if you want.
it does now. and the ntfs factoid is what you want.
it worked thx a lot
did you hear of skype? there is also gnome-meeting which is compatible with netmeeting in windows.
i kno skype and netmeeting but i need one that works in gaim for example
do u kno if amsn works
I dont think msd messenger supports voice.
one last thing how can i make my account hav full root credentials
read the root wiki page.
